title: Facebook Ad Copy Generator
description: Create high-converting ad copy for Facebook and Instagram
prompt:
Write 3 variations of Facebook Ad copy for [PRODUCT].

Target Audience: [AUDIENCE]
Pain Point: [PROBLEM]
Solution: [PRODUCT BENEFIT]
Offer: [DISCOUNT/TRIAL]

Format:
1. Primary Text (Hook + Story + Benefit)
2. Headline (Short & Punchy)
3. Description (Social Proof/Urgency)
4. CTA Button choice

title: SEO Content Strategy Builder
description: Plan a month of SEO-optimized content
prompt:
Create a content strategy to rank for [KEYWORD].

Competitors: [LIST COMPETITORS]
Current Domain Authority: [Low/Medium/High]

Plan:
1. Pillar Page Topic (The main hub)
2. 5 Cluster Topics (Supporting articles)
3. Keyword variations for each
4. User Intent (Informational/Transactional)
5. Internal linking structure

title: Influencer Brief Template
prompt:
Create a campaign brief for an influencer.

Brand: [BRAND]
Campaign Theme: [THEME]
Deliverables: [1 Reel + 3 Stories]
Key Messages: [POINTS TO HIT]
Do's and Don'ts: [GUIDELINES]

Include:
- Mood board description
- Call to Action specific to their audience
- Tracking link instructions

title: Email Subject Line Tester
description: Generate and analyze subject lines for open rates
prompt:
Generate 10 email subject lines for [EMAIL TOPIC].

Audience: [AUDIENCE]
Goal: [Open Rate/Click Through]

Styles:
1. Curiosity gap
2. Urgency/Scarcity
3. Personal/Direct
4. Benefit-driven
5. Weird/Pattern Interrupt

Rate each 1-10 for predicted open rate.

title: Marketing Persona Builder
description: Detailed buyer personas to target your marketing
prompt:
Create a detailed marketing persona for [PRODUCT].

Name: [NAME]
Demographics: [AGE, LOCATION, JOB]

Psychographics:
1. Values & Beliefs
2. Hobbies & Interests
3. Media Consumption (Where do they hang out?)
4. Buying Motivations
5. Objections to buying
6. Favorite brands (and why)

title: Viral TikTok Script
description: Scripts designed for high retention and engagement
prompt:
Write a script for a viral-style TikTok video.

Topic: [TOPIC]
Niche: [NICHE]

Structure:
1. Visual Hook (0-3s): Text on screen + Action
2. Verbal Hook: Controversial statement or question
3. Value/Story (15-30s): Fast-paced delivery
4. The Twist/Reveal
5. CTA (Save this for later/Follow for more)

title: Go-To-Market Strategy
prompt:
Create a GTM strategy for [NEW PRODUCT].

Target Market: [MARKET]
Launch Date: [DATE]

Phases:
1. Pre-launch (Build hype/Waitlist)
2. Launch Day (Channels & Activities)
3. Post-launch (Retention & Upsell)

Channels to focus on:
- Organic Social
- Paid Ads
- Email
- Partnerships
